headline: Which turnaround should you bet on: Nike or Citi?
summary: Nike (NKE) and Citigroup (C) are both in the middle of turnarounds. But Solidarity Capital CEO Jeff McClean says there is only one you should bet on. Find out what it is in the latest Good Buy or Goodbye? To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: S4Capital's Monks Appoints Danny Lee as Managing Director for Greater China
